entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider murmur non-cryptographic hash support #102005
    Future
  • MemoryAllocatedForJitCode ETW Event missing in trace, but CLRStackWalk still fires #102004
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't warn on reflection access to annotated members when the source of the `Type` is GetType on a DAM-annotated class #102002
  • error code 11050 for IPStatus not listed #101999
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't report AOT warnings caused by reflection access to annotated methods within compiler generated methods #101998
  • Inlining Heuristics and String Interpolation for Exception Paths #101996
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Kill System.Diagnostics.Process on parent death #101985
  • Configuration Binding Generator does not correctly handle required fields in child objects. #101984
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat is never recognized by Blazor #101992
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64-SVE: Masked versions of Across methods #101974
  • ARM64-SVE: Detect mask usage for Across functions #101973
    9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Use predicate versions of instructions #101970
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 8 Regressions on 5/4/2024 5:29:12 AM #101989
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 33 Regressions on 5/3/2024 2:25:46 AM #101990
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 4/30/2024 10:57:18 AM #101991
  • [API Proposal]: Allow supplying a Regex object to a RegularExpressionAttribute #101965
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/RefFields/Validate/Validate.cmd #101964
  • Make Generic Type allows you to create types with abstract classes when the constrant should block it #101962
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\GCHandle\\Alloc\\Alloc.cmd #101961
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NETClients/IDispatch/NETClientIDispatch/NETClientIDispatch.cmd #101959
  • DbgEnableMiniDump does not work with PublishSingleFile #101957
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't warn on ref parameters as assignments from parameter to argument #101955

Closed

  • [Question/Bug] Endless stream of GC events occupying a CPU core: What could be happening ? #101563
  • MIssing runtime deps for 8.0.4 #101413
  • (net9.0-ios preview 3) SRE not available when interpreter is enabled #101840
  • Why is `biarch` image used for Arm64 glibc and not Alpine? #101707
  • Test failure: ValueFactory attempted to access the Value property of this instance. #100476
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make `string` implement `IReadOnlyList<char>` #91756
  • String should still implement IReadOnlyList<char> #97954
  • JIT: Redundant bulk barrier for zero struct #101983
  • Update tools to the latest version of System.Reflection.Metadata #101541
    9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: No obvious way to mask an Across function #101770
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/23/2024 10:12:07 PM #99004
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm64] AF: codeManager->IsUnwindable(pvAddress) || runtime->IsConservativeStackReportingEnabled() #101896
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\GCHandle\\Alloc\\Alloc.cmd #101960
  • Debugger.NotifyOfCrossThreadDependency can be slow when a debugger is attached #38736
    9.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GCHandle\\AddrOfPinnedObject_neg\\AddrOfPinnedObject_neg.cmd #101901
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ThreadNative_GetProcessDefaultStackSize #102003
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Explicitly link against the dotnet/llvm-project libc++ #102001
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Declare __cxa_demangle where it's used based on the Itanium ABI instead of including the ABI header. #101997
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Partially revert "Disable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes (#100309)" #101995
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Profile AOT: Relax is_local_inst to let more methods qualified for AOT compilation #101987
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Make debug logs with string literals that create garbage conditional #101986
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Support SV48 Virtual Memory Layout #101966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Merging some similar SVE formats into `SVE_AT_3A` #101958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold nullchecks in Interlocked.* #101956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Switch from arm64 biarch image to Azure Linux image #101946
    needs-area-label
  • Fix arm64 callee saved register set #101971
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove Thread::m_pDomain - always the one app domain #101749
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Fix LocaleNumber_MeasurementSystem #101968
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BitwiseClear and BooleanNot #101853
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Finish the TypeName cleanup #101910
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Remove unused --arch and --gc switches from driver.c #101934
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use REG_INDIRECT_CALL_TARGET_REG for indirect calls on arm64 #101927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve performance of Debugger.NotifyOfCrossThreadDependency under a debugger #101864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: fix STRESS_BB_PROFILE issue #101925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64. #101891
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move issue links from comments to the warning attributes in trimming tests. #101819
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named DOTNET_GCPath #101874
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add top-level controls for VMR to enable/disable system lbiraries #101797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Remove O1K_VALUE_NUMBER #101894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Making installer tests pass on OSX-arm64 in Release build #91519
    area-Host
  • Prototype fix for `Environement.GetCommandLineArgs()[0]` (#101837) #101880
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: Visit switch successors in increasing likelihood order for RPO-based layout #101935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use alternative mechanisms to allow us to use the default new/delete implementations #101947
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • [Test Only] WinHttp CI Test 2 #101940
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [Test Only] WinHttp CI Test 1 #101939
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [Release/8.0] Fix handling exceptions on shutdown #101915
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix doc comments #99331
    needs-area-label
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take into account the provided format in Utf8Parser.TryParse for bool #100676
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Overriding ImportRuntimeIlcPackageTarget won't be needed after SDK integration #2577
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] JS interop in ILC package #2576

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable Task, JSObject and delegate JS interop #2551
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Make ImportRuntimeIlcPackageTarget override conditional #2572
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Include JS interop generator in ILC package #2573
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build on Linux #2574
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean-up CODEOWNERS file #40739

Closed

  • Unexpected Build Cache Invalidation #38935
    Discussion
  • Workload packages that are unlisted can't be installed #40440
    8.0.4xx
  • SDK resolver does not work with snap installations of SDK on Linux #10403
    Backlog
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #40235

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40752
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unused files #40750
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Define run tests timeout for UB/SB CI #40749
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #40745
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build, untriaged
  • Cleanup snap artifacts #40744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/content/repo-projects/installer.proj #40742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Add RazorWarningLevel #40720
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add musl and arm64 prebuilts #40743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit installing unlisted Fixes #40440 #40534
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Restructure test assets and baselines #40746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sync the VMR from sdk into dotnet/dotnet main #40724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update src source build content #40719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add preview VS note to developer guide #40542
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2447145 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Accept it if the versions from different sets are equal #40485
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove the 7.0 template packages #40710

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645

    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Edit speclets to distinguish features already delivered from potential future enhancements #8098

PullRequests

Created

  • Add dictionary expressions item to meeting agenda #8100

Merged

  • Adjust formatting to make rules easier to spot #8103
  • Partial properties cannot explicitly implement interface methods #8102
  • Update README.md to point to recently added notes #8099

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: update conversion rules based on recent discussions #8095
  • Adjust dynamic binding rules for a situation of a single applicable candidate. #8027

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing nullability warning is reported for a deconstruction #73374
  • EnC: display class might have no synthesized members #73365
  • IDE0028/IDE0300 is not reported for overloaded methods #73362
    Backlog

Closed

  • Erroneous "Use of unassigned local variable" for out parameter used inside collection expression #73376
  • `CS1591` fires for protected members on sealed types #73348

PullRequests

Created

  • Partial properties: indexers #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73377
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix overload resolution regression around params parameters #73373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Have code action tests run in OOP mode by default #73372
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove IsCompatBreakingFeatureEnabled method #73371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Remove unnecessary project reference to System.Text.Json #73370
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: workaround for empty display class #73366
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • EnC: Add asterisk based assembly version docs #73364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Merged

  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73375
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update code cleanup to run in parallel #73368
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Sort services #73367
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove VersionStamp serialization #73359
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify progress scope code #73358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make fix-all code action more parallel #73356
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add public API for ref like type parameters #73335
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Take MetadataAsSource out of Roslyn package startup path #73360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Expose a few things to Razor #73361
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Run final fix-all code-cleanup phase out of process. #73357
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve C# grammar generator. #73340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EditForm does not bind values #55591
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55589
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #55588
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mvc, plaintext #55587
  • Unit test projects with JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault=false cannot use WebApplicationFactory #55586
  • Wrong controller route param names #55584
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Static Rendering and Unhandled Exception: Incorrect Content-Type For Forms #55582
  • How to get access token in Blazor server with Azure B2C #55578
  • [QuickGrid] - Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55576
  • Stateful reconnect doesn't work as expected when using Redis backplane #55575
  • Incorrect Serialization of long (Int64) Values in ASP.NET Core Web API #55571
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json_spring #55570
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #55569
  • Project that uses Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web copies packages.lock.json to output #55568

Closed

  • Consider adding description to Produces for OpenAPI #55573
  • Design proposal: Localization with multiple assemblies at the same time #46034
    Backlog
  • dotnet watch help is not localized #37645
    Backlog
  • Data Annotations Localization does not inherits the resource from base class #43885
    Backlog
  • InputSelect displays incorrect value after updating select list #55478
  • How to provide instance for BlazorWebView in xaml page to reuse single Text editor component with multiple BlazorWebView #54823
  • MAUI Blazor Android - enter keypress on textbox causes infinite loop of form submission #54848
  • Remote authenticators violate CSP form-action 'self' #55491
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_spring #55544
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring #55562
  • Multiple @page breaks css isolation in .net 8.0 blazor #55517

PullRequests

Created

  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking

Merged

  • Update InternalServerError.cs #55572
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • [Blazor] Adds static asset endpoints, serve compressed assets #55558
    area-blazor
  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

Issues

Created

  • [SymbolStore] Add support to index .NET Framework Runtime debugging modules #4616
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot expand tabs to full width on iOS #22278
  • CollectionView - No cambia la interfaz de usuario al modificar un elemento de un ObservableCollection #22277
  • Don't propagate handler updates when updating the Frame inside VisualElement #22271
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [net9.0][testing] Android Compatibility UITests are not working on net9.0 branch #22267
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer is not working when swipe on the child element(scrollview) in the android platform. #22264
  • Reenable the FileVersion test #22263
    Backlog
  • Refactor the windows.cake script #22262
    Backlog
  • Maui Android intent filter ActionView for MimeTypes not working #22261
  • Lack of OnAppeared Lifecycle Event #22260
  • Do not truncate ActionSheet title on Android #22259
    Backlog

Closed

  • Razor-maui-hybrid template shows a black window often. #22273
  • iOS Frame/Carousel/Image does not work on iOS #16003
    Backlog
  • Put MAUI.Blazor to linux now is possible #22242
    Backlog
  • CarouselView crashes IOS app #9775
    Backlog
  • [net9.0][testing] Control iOS device tests don't finish #21362
    .NET 9 Planning
  • In a ToolbarItems, if an item has no icon but just text, MAUI uses the icon from the previous page in the Navigation #7823
    Backlog
  • [ci] Remove mono as requirement #20814
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [build] Remove GitInfo #19185
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Building app on github actions is not updating AndroidManifest.xml #22091
  • [BUG] Detecting iOS Code Signing Authority does not respect PropertyGroup conditions in Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 2.0 / .NET MAUI 9.0 #21546
  • [android] Identified crash in toolbar extensions when using a custom image source #22138
  • Border does not resize correctly (android) #20943
  • Windows TitleBar is now permanently transparent showing things underneath (.NET8), did not have this issue before (.NET7) #20976
  • Unable to turn off Fast Deployment for .Net8 Maui Android project #21572
  • HttpClient and AcceptEncoding gzip on Android stoped working after latest SR4 release. #21786
  • Error "The type 'NSObject' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0" #22021
  • Adding +/- sign to numeric entry to allow negative inputs for iOS #17911
  • Off color Switch bar #17939
  • Please let WebView support CSS media query ‘prefers-color-scheme' #18436
  • [WinUI 3] MAUI Grid should be a native Grid #18738
  • Adding buttons to the title bar #19564
  • PagerControl for big screen device #19615
  • Bottom View under the shell #19621
  • ImageCache to clean dictionary instead of keeping semaphores permanently in memory #19656
  • Make AppThemeBinding type public #19725
  • Shell tab algnment as it is made for TabbedPage #19886
  • Provide documentation for Instrumentation / OpenTelemetry #20338
  • Switch Control #21942
  • Gradiant on Label and others components #22046
  • The rapid response of DragGesture Recognizer. #22141
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #22146
  • Allow fullscreen by MAUI.Blazor calls #21824
  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT) crash on android release when forcing screen orientation #22106
  • UIDevice.CurrentDevice.Orientation return Unknown in 8.0.20 works in 8.0.6 #21922
  • LineHeight with HTML Label not working #22193
  • PointerGestureRecognizer Does not work on android #22199
  • Displaying a map using iOS 17.4 causes crash #22241
  • [Windows Only]ImageButton get stuck in "PointerOver" state if right click #21706
    .NET 8 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Shape crash on 125% display size #22283
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/cat 😻
  • [build] make `TrimMode=full` function like NativeAOT #22282
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #22276
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Trigger remeasure when constraints on CV changes #22270
    area/collectionview 📃

Merged

  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [main] Update arcade #22265
  • Make sure to copy and push the vs-workloads props #22266
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix UITests so it can recover from unresponsive app #22240
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Avoid Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [UI Test] Update Appium to 5.0.0-rc.8 #22117
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area/templates 📄
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get PrimaryKey value in SavingChangesAsync interceptor #33686
  • ModelBuilder and UseIdentityColumn fails to set identity property on column #33684

Closed

  • Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions #33661
  • The instance of entity type 'XXXX' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value 'XXX' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #33629

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Tweak yaml so that markdown edits don't trigger CI legs #7819
  • Install -> uninstall -> install breaks SDK #7812

Updated

  • Windows installer has poor dpi scaling #6959
  • Language of installer does not match display language #2453
    backlog
  • Address the 'High Contrast Black' yellow hyperlinks: SDK bundle #1130
  • Restart text cut off in bundle installer #7811
  • UpgradeCode of .Net hosting bundle 8.0.0 installer does not work #19633

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19709
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19708
  • Remove unused files #19707
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #19692

Merged

  • Specify artifacts path #19690
  • Remove VMR and source-build infrastructure from installer #19697
  • Cherry-pick: Create 0001-Disable-APICompat-for-DotNetBuild.patch (#19612) #19687
  • Handle spaces in properties passed to VMR's build.sh #19686
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19675
  • Fix comparison for scenario tests condition #19670
  • Add false positive wpf licenses to exclusions #19685
  • Allow diagnostics test binaries #19682

Updated

  • Update to the shipping version of MSBuild #19041
  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #18941
  • Add Join-Verticals task, use it at the final Join Point #19369
  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • Clean up contents from previously-sb tarball post binary-cleanup #19632
  • Avoid intermediate scenario-tests.proj #19636
  • Add top-level controls to VMR for system libraries #19640
